name: house_prices_estimate
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool zoopla_v2.
Tool description: This API helps to query for properties for rent, sale in UK to create a real estate site/application such as zoopla.com
API description: Estimates house prices based on given criteria and returns a list of estimated prices.

area.description: The value of suggestions/value json object returned in .../auto-complete endpoint with properties as search_type. You must use EXACTLY the value  returned by the endpoint.

property_type.description: The type of property. Options are 'detached', 'flat', 'terraced', 'semi_detached'.

page_number.description: The page index for pagination. Default is 1.

order_by.description: The attribute by which to order the results. Options are 'price_paid', 'last_sold', 'address', 'estimated_value'. Default is 'address'.

page_size.description: The number of items per response. Maximum is 40. Default is 40.

ordering.description: The order direction of the results. Options are 'ascending', 'descending'. Default is 'descending'.

identifier.description: The value of suggestions/identifier json object returned in .../auto-complete endpoint with properties as search_type. You must use EXACTLY the value returned by the endpoint.
